title: Complete Van Gogh : Paintings, Drawings
description: Shipped from UK, please allow 10 to 21 business days for arrival. Good, 498pp. From Potato Peelers to Sunflowers, copiously illustrated, large format book. lots of not usually seen paintings & drawings. Previous owner's initials (L.H.)in ink on front endpaper and some fading & small tear on top of spine. Otherwise excellent condition. loose inside, letter to Prof. Luke Herrmann (L.H.) from Kurt Zimmermann of Kunsthaus Buhler Museum, Stuttgart, asking about authenticity of illustrated painting. (Letter in German, dated 11/4/2006.)
author: Jan Hulsker
